thread.title: Hyatt Regency Suzhou celebrates its first anniversary
thread.title_full: Hyatt Regency Suzhou celebrates its first anniversary

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Hyatt Regency Suzhou celebrates its first anniversary
text:
Hyatt Regency Suzhou celebrates its first anniversary   
Aug 12, 2015 Banners   
SUZHOU, China - The Hyatt Regency Suzhou is preparing four weeks of good times and special events in August 2015 to celebrate the hotel's first birthday . 
Opened on August 24, 2014 in the heart of Suzhou's latest CBD, the Hyatt Regency Suzhou hotel offers 355 guestrooms and suites, five restaurants and lounges, 15,000 square feet of event venues, and spa and wellness facilities. 
"Our first year has been overwhelming, as we have surpassed all expectations in terms of business, hotel position and service standards. It is extremely satisfying to see what we have achieved in such a short time. Credit must be given to our guests, business partners, owners and staff for doing an amazing job", said General Manager Gary Chan . 
Hyatt Regency Suzhou i s just 25 minutes by train from Shanghai , one hour by car from Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport, and 10 minutes by car f rom Suzhou SIP Railway Station . With subway access on the doorstep, Hyatt Regency Suzhou is part of Jinghope Plaza, a complex including a luxury shopping mall, entertainment venues and two Grade-A office buildings that also neighbours picturesque Jinji Lake , the Culture and Arts and Expo Centers and the Ferris Wheel Park for a convenient blend between old and new Suzhou. 
Hyatt Regency Suzhou has received more than 20 awards during its first year.
